p: Biological tests carried out on the adults of Tribolium castaneum have led to the conclusion that the essential oil of Ruta chalepensis L. collected from the Oulmes region has a very high repellent power belonging to the class V; also, when the dose used increases, the repellency rate increases and the duration of exposure decreases. Therefore, the repellent effect of the essential oil of Ruta chalepensis against the adults of Tribolium castaneum is dose- and time-dependent.
